name: image
short_description: The network chaos injection workload container image
description: The network chaos injection workload container image

name: chaos-duration
description: Set chaos duration (in sec) as desired

name: pod-selector
description: Pod selector used to target one or more pods by label

name: execution
description: When multiple pods are selected the execution on all of them can be performed in serial or in parallel

name: namespace
description: Namespace where the scenario container will be deployed

name: instance-count
description: Number of instances to target if more the one is selected by the POD_SELECTOR

name: pod-name
description: The Pod name to target (if label selector not specified)

name: service-account
short_description: The service account associated with the Node Network Filter workload
description: The service account associated with the Node Network Filter workload

name: taints
short_description: The list of tolerations that can be assigned to the network filter workload
description: The list of tolerations that can be assigned to the network filter workload (comma separated)

name: latency
description: The network latency injected on the pod interface expressed as a string (eg. 50ms)

name: loss
description: the percentage of packet that will be dropeed, the value must be a percentage between 0 and 1 (eg. 0.5%)

name: network-shaping-execution
description: Execute Latency, Loss and Bandwidth shaping in parallel or serially
